message: This is a high-quality product, worth $125. I'm offering it to you for $100, which is a 20% discount. If you buy it, you'll be getting a great deal!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I believe this is a good deal and I would like to purchase the high-quality product.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! However, I must inform you that this next product is a different story. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100, which is a significant discount from its actual value. I'm not making a profit on this one, and I'm essentially giving it away. It's a great opportunity to get a product for almost nothing!
I appreciate the opportunity, Alice. Given the significant discount and the fact that you're not making a profit, I believe this is another good deal. I would like to purchase this product as well.

I'm glad you're enjoying the value you're getting from these products! However, I want to be transparent with you - I've had a bit of a run of bad luck with this batch, and I'm starting to think it's not just a coincidence. I'm willing to let you have this one for $100, but I'm not going to sugarcoat it - it's a low-quality product, and you won't get much value out of it. But hey, it's only $100, and you might be able to find some use for it somewhere.

Thank you for the honesty, Alice. While I appreciate the low price, I think it's best for me to pass on this product due to the risk of it being low-quality. I prefer to invest in products that are likely to provide value.

I completely understand your caution in the previous round! I want to assure you that this product is a different story. In fact, it's one of the best ones I have left. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100, which is still a great deal considering its actual value. I'm willing to take on the risk of selling it to you at this price, because I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
Thank you for the reassurance, Alice. I trust your judgment, and given the confidence you have in this product, I believe it's worth taking the risk. I would like to purchase this product for $100.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on my judgment! This product is indeed another high-quality one, and I'm happy to offer it to you for $100. However, I want to sweeten the deal for you. This way, you'll have even more confidence in your purchase.

I appreciate the additional value you're offering with the free inspection report, Alice. Given that it's a high-quality product and the extra assurance it provides, I would like to purchase this product for $100.

I'm glad you're enjoying the benefits of buying from me! However, I have to be honest with you, this next product is not up to par. I'm not going to sugarcoat it - it's a low-quality item, and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone. But, I'm willing to let you have it for $100, and I'll even throw in a special warranty that will cover any issues you might encounter. It's a one-time offer, and I'm essentially taking on all the risk.

I appreciate the special warranty you're offering, Alice, but given the nature of the product and the fact that it's low-quality, I think it's best for me to pass on this offer. I prefer to avoid potential risks and focus on purchasing high-quality items that provide value.
